Comprehensive Driving Guide: Alberta 🚗: Hagaha Wadista Baabuurta oo Dhamaystiran: Alberta 🚗
Understanding road signs is crucial for: Fahamka calaamadaha wadooyinka waa mid muhiim ah si loogu wado si nabadgelyo ah Alberta. Calaamadahan waxay bixiyaan macluumaad muhiim ah oo ku saabsan sharciyada, digniinaha, iyo hagida. Halkan waxaad ka eegi kartaa qaar ka mid ah calaamadaha wadooyinka ee muhiimka ah ee aad la kulmi doonto iyo macnahooda.
These signs inform you of traffic laws a: Calaamadahan waxay ku wargelinayaan sharciyada iyo xeerarka taraafikada. Waa inaad u hogaansantaa.
An octagon-shaped red sign instructing d: Calaamad casaan ah oo qaab octagonal ah oo ku amraysa darawallada inay si buuxda u joogsadaan ka hor xariiqda joogsiga, isgoyska lugaynta, ama isgoyska, iyo inay siiyaan jidka gaadiidka kale ama lugaynta.
A downward-pointing red and white triang: Sadex-geesood casaan iyo caddaan ah oo hoos u jeeda oo tilmaamaya inaad tahay inaad gaabisay oo aad diyaar u tahay inaad joogsato haddii loo baahdo, adigoo siinaya mudnaanta gaadiidka kale ama lugaynta.
A red circle with a white horizontal bar: Goob wareegsan oo casaan ah oo leh bar cad oo siman, oo tilmaamaysa in gaadiidka laga mamnuucay inuu galo waddo ama meel gaar ah.
A black arrow making a U-turn with a red: Fallad madow oo samaynaysa U-turn oo leh goob casaan ah iyo xariiq, taas oo macnaheedu yahay in U-turns-ka aan la oggolayn.
A black arrow pointing left with a red c: Fallad madow oo bidix u jeedda oo leh goob casaan ah iyo xariiq, oo tilmaamaysa in leexashada bidix aan la oggolayn.
A rectangular white sign with a black ar: Calaamad cad oo leydi ah oo leh fallad madow, oo tilmaamaysa in taraafikada ay ku socoto oo kaliya jihada falladda.
A rectangular white sign with black text: Calaamad cad oo leydi ah oo leh qoraal madow, oo tilmaamaysa xawaaraha ugu sarreeya ee sharciga ah ee qaybta wadada.
These signs warn you of potential hazard: Calaamadahan waxay kaa digayaan khataraha suurtagalka ah ee hore, taas oo kaa dalbaysa inaad taxaddar muujiso.
A diamond-shaped yellow sign with a blac: Calaamad jaalle ah oo qaabka dheemanka ah oo leh summad madow oo lugeeye ah, oo digniin ka bixinaysa in isgoys lugeeye gaar ah uu soo socdo.
A pentagon-shaped sign (often fluorescen: Calaamad qaab shantoge ah (inta badan jaalle-cagaar fluorescent ah) oo tilmaamaysa aag dugsi ama isgoys dugsi oo hore, badanaana leh xawaaraha oo yaraada marka ay shaqaynayso.
A circular yellow sign with a black 'X': Calaamad jaalle ah oo wareegsan oo leh 'X' madow iyo 'RR' oo tilmaamaysa isgoys tareen oo hore. U diyaar garow inaad u joogsato tareenada.
A diamond-shaped yellow sign with a blac: Calaamad jaalle ah oo qaab dheeman ah oo leh fallaadh madow oo maroojis ah, oo digniin ka bixinaysa in maroojis wadada ku yaal uu soo socdo. Xawaarahaaga u hagaaji si waafaqsan.
A diamond-shaped yellow sign with a car: Calaamad jaalle ah oo qaab dheeman ah oo leh baabuur siibanaya, oo digniin ka bixinaysa in dusha wadada ay noqon karto mid sibidh ah marka ay qoyan tahay.
A diamond-shaped yellow sign with a deer: Calaamad jaalle ah oo qaab dheeman ah oo leh summad deer ah, oo tilmaamaysa meelaha ay deeradu inta badan ka gudubto wadada. Si taxaddar leh u wado, gaar ahaan aroorta iyo maqribka.
An orange diamond-shaped sign warning of: Calaamad orange ah oo qaab dheeman ah oo digniin ka bixinaysa shaqo dhisma ama dayactir oo hore. Filo xawaaraha oo yaraada, xidhitaanka jidadka, ama shaqaale.
These signs provide information about ro: Calaamadahan waxay bixiyaan macluumaad ku saabsan waddooyinka, jihada, goobaha, iyo meelaha xiisaha leh.
Typically a rectangular green sign with: Caadi ahaan calaamad cagaar ah oo leydi ah oo leh qoraal cad, oo tilmaamaysa jihada iyo masaafada magaalooyinka ama degmooyinka.
A blue square sign with a white 'H' (and: Calaamad buluug ah oo laba jibbaaran oo leh 'H' cad (iyo inta badan calaamad iskutallaab ah), oo tilmaamaysa joogitaanka ama jihada cisbitaal ama xarun caafimaad.
A blue square sign with a white gas pump: Calaamad buluug ah oo laba jibbaaran oo leh summad bamka shidaalka ah, oo tilmaamaysa joogitaanka ama jihada saldhig shidaal.
A blue square sign with a picnic table s: Calaamad buluug ah oo laba jibbaaran oo leh summad miiska cashada ah, oo tilmaamaysa goob nasasho ama goob casha oo hore.
A square blue sign with a white 'P' (and: Calaamad buluug ah oo laba jibbaaran oo leh 'P' cad (iyo marmarka qaarkood xeerar dheeraad ah), oo tilmaamaysa meelaha baarkinka loo oggol yahay.
Divided Highway Ahead Sign: Calaamadda Jidka Weyn ee Kala Qaybsan Hore
A yellow diamond-shaped sign with two ar: Calaamad jaalle ah oo qaab dheeman ah oo leh laba fallaadh oo ay kala qaybsan yihiin bar, oo digniin ka bixinaysa in jidka weyn ee hore uu kala qaybsami doono.
This sign indicates that the road ahead: Calaamadani waxay tilmaamaysaa in wadada hore ay tahay waddo laba-jiho ah, halkaas oo gaadiidku ay ku socdaan jihooyin iska soo horjeeda oo ku saabsan isla wadada. Taxaddar ka muuji gaadiidka soo socda.
This sign instructs drivers to keep to t: Calaamaddan waxay faraysaa darawallada inay wataan dhinaca midig ee wadada, gaar ahaan marka ay la kulmaan taraafikada soo socda ama marka ay jiraan jidad badan, si loo fududeeyo socodka taraafikada oo fudud.
Road Narrows on Both Sides: Wadada oo Labada Dhinacba ku Yaraata
This sign warns that the width of the ro: Calaamaddani waxay digniin ka bixinaysaa in ballaca wadada hore ay hoos u dhici doonto labada dhinacba, bidix iyo midig. U diyaar garow inaad isku darto ama aad hagaajiso booskaaga, oo ka digtoonow ciriiriga suurtagalka ah.
This sign means you are not allowed to s: Calaamaddani waxay la macno tahay inaan lagu oggolayn inaad joojiso gaarigaaga meesha loogu talagalay sabab kasta, xitaa in yar oo aad ku soo qaadato ama ku dejiso rakaab. Tani waxay inta badan khuseysaa meelaha u baahan socod taraafikada oo joogto ah.
This sign warns drivers that there is a: Calaamaddani waxay darawallada uga digaysaa inuu jiro joogsiga basaska dugsiga ee loogu talagalay oo hore. U diyaar garow inaad gaabisid oo aad joogsato haddii baska dugsiga uu shaqaysiiyo laydhadhkiisa casaan ee biligleynaya si uu carruur u soo qaado ama u dejiyo.
This sign warns drivers of a section of: Calaamaddani waxay darawallada uga digaysaa qayb ka mid ah wadada oo leh dhul aan simanayn ama qallafsan. Xawaarahaaga hoos u dhig oo si adag u qabo isteerinka si aad si ammaan ah ugu wado dusha sare.
This sign indicates that the road ahead: Calaamaddani waxay tilmaamaysaa in wadada hore aysan lahayn meel laga baxo ama marin, taas oo macnaheedu yahay inay ku dhammaato waddo xiran ama marinka xiran. Waxaad u baahan doontaa inaad dib u laabato.
Bump or Uneven Pavement on the Road Ahea: Bumo ama Bayaac aan Simanayn oo ku yaalla Wadada Hore
This sign warns of a raised area or an u: Calaamaddani waxay digniin ka bixinaysaa meel sare ama dhul aan simanayn oo wadada ku yaal, sida burooyin xawaare ama cillado halis ah. Xawaarahaaga hoos u dhig si aad uga fogaato burburka gaarigaaga ama luminta xakamaynta.
This sign indicates a playground zone, w: Calaamaddani waxay tilmaamaysaa aag ciyaaraha carruurta, halkaas oo carruurtu ay ku ciyaari karaan meel u dhow. Xawaaraha badanaaba waa la dhimaa (tusaale, ilaa 30 km/h) saacadaha gaarka ah, waxaana loo baahan yahay taxaddar dheeraad ah.
This sign warns drivers of a series of c: Calaamaddani waxay darawallada uga digaysaa taxane maroojisyo ama leexashooyin ah oo hore. Xawaarahaaga hoos u dhig oo u diyaar garow inaad isteeriso maroojisya si aad u ilaaliso xakamaynta gaarigaaga.
This regulatory sign requires you to slo: Calaamaddan xeerarku waxay kaa dalbaysaa inaad gaabisid oo, haddii loo baahdo, aad joogsato si aad u siiso mudnaanta gaadiidka iyo lugaynta horeyba ugu jiray isgoyska ama wadada aad galayso.
This sign indicates a circular intersect: Calaamaddani waxay tilmaamaysaa isgoys wareegsan (roundabout) oo hore. Waa inaad siisaa mudnaanta taraafikada horey ugu jirta goobta wareegsan oo aad gashaa marka uu jiro meel ammaan ah.
This sign reminds drivers and cyclists t: Calaamaddani waxay xusuusinaysaa darawallada iyo baaskiilleyda inay tahay inay wadaagaan wadada si ammaan ah. Waxay inta badan tilmaamaysaa meelaha ay baaskiilleydu ku badan yihiin, iyadoo ku dhiirigelinaysa darawallada inay ka digtoonaadaan baaskiillada.
This sign marks a school crosswalk, aler: Calaamaddani waxay calaamadaysaa isgoys dugsi, oo ka digaysa darawallada inay ka digtoonaadaan ardayda isgoyska wadada. U diyaar garow inaad joogsato oo aad u siiso mudnaanta lugaynta ku sugan isgoyska.
This sign indicates that vehicles carryi: Calaamaddani waxay tilmaamaysaa in gaadiidka sidda alaabta halista ah ay tahay inay maraan waddooyin gaar ah ama ay u hoggaansamaan xeerarka qaarkood. Waxaa inta badan la socda calaamado tilmaamaya nooca alaabta halista ah.
This sign warns that the right lane ahea: Calaamaddani waxay digniin ka bixinaysaa in jidka midig ee hore uu dhammaan doono ama uu ku biiri doono jidka ku xiga. Darawallada jidka dhammaanaya waa inay si ammaan ah ugu biiraan bidix, iyagoo siinaya mudnaanta taraafikada ku sugan jidka dheeraadka ah.
A reflective orange triangle with a red: Sadex-geesood orange ah oo muraayad ah oo leh cidhif casaan ah ayaa lagu dhejiyaa gadaasha gaadiidka sida caadiga ah ku socda xawaare 40 km/saacaddii ama ka yar. Waxay digniin ka bixinaysaa darawallada kale inay gaabisadaan.
This sign indicates that traffic in the: Calaamaddani waxay tilmaamaysaa in taraafikada ku sugan jidka ama isgoyska ay ku leexan karaan oo kaliya dhinaca midig. Leexashada toosan ama bidixda lama oggolayn.
